resource_dependency.registrationFormSchema: Database table 'users' with fields: id (UUID), email (string, unique), password_hash (string), role (enum: 'client', 'driver'), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp).

function: Allow new users to register and existing users to log in to the system.
static_description: A centered form on a white background with navy-colored input fields labeled 'Email', 'Password', and 'Confirm Password'. Buttons labeled 'Register' and 'Login' styled in navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Register' submits the form to the /api/auth/register endpoint. Clicking 'Login' submits credentials to /api/auth/login.
As the user types into the fields, validation messages appear below invalid inputs (e.g., mismatched passwords).

resource_dependency.profileDataSchema: Database table 'profiles' with fields: user_id (foreign key to users.id), first_name (string), last_name (string), phone_number (string), address (text), bio (text), avatar_url (string), resume_url (string), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp).

function: Enable users to create and manage personal profile information.
static_description: Profile page with editable fields for name, phone number, address, bio, and file upload areas for avatar and resume. All elements use navy text on a white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Save Changes' sends updated profile data to /api/profiles/{userId}. Clicking 'Upload Avatar' opens a file picker and uploads to /api/uploads/avatar.
Fields become editable when clicked, showing save/cancel buttons upon modification.

resource_dependency.jobPostingsSchema: Database table 'job_postings' with fields: id (UUID), client_id (foreign key to users.id), title (string), description (text), location (string), salary (string), status (enum: 'active', 'closed'), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp).

function: Allow clients to create and manage their job postings.
static_description: Form with navy-themed input fields for job title, description, location, and salary. Toggle switch for activating/deactivating job posts. Table listing current job postings with status indicators.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Post Job' submits the form to /api/jobs/create. Toggling job status updates via PATCH request to /api/jobs/{id}/status.
Clicking a job entry populates the form with existing data for editing.

resource_dependency.applicationsSchema: Database table 'applications' with fields: id (UUID), job_id (foreign key to job_postings.id), applicant_id (foreign key to users.id), cover_letter (text), applied_at (timestamp), status (enum: 'pending', 'reviewed', 'accepted', 'rejected').

function: Enable users to apply for jobs and track application statuses.
static_description: Application form with a cover letter text area and file upload for resumes. Status tracking panel displays submitted applications with colored badges indicating status (pending, reviewed, accepted, rejected).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Submit Application' sends data to /api/applications/apply. Clicking an application in the tracker reloads details from /api/applications/status.
Uploading a resume attaches it to the application before submission.

resource_dependency.contactFormSchema: Database table 'contact_messages' with fields: id (UUID), name (string), email (string), subject (string), message (text), submitted_at (timestamp).

function: Collect visitor inquiries through a contact form and store them for follow-up.
static_description: Simple form with fields for Name, Email, Subject, and Message. Submit button styled in navy. Confirmation message appears after successful submission.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Send Message' submits the form to /api/contact/submit and shows a success confirmation.
Validation highlights empty or improperly formatted fields in real time.

function: Provide centralized navigation across all primary website sections.
static_description: Top horizontal navigation bar with logo aligned left and menu items aligned right. Background is white with navy text. Active page highlighted with underline.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking any menu item navigates to the corresponding page route (e.g., /about-us, /jobs).
Hovering over menu items slightly increases font weight for emphasis.

resource_dependency.companyInfoContent: Static markdown content describing company history, mission, vision, team members, and values.

function: Present detailed information about the company to visitors.
static_description: Full-width section with navy headings and paragraphs on a white background. May include embedded images or icons sourced from assets folder.

resource_dependency.clientTestimonialsSchema: Database table 'testimonials' with fields: id (UUID), client_name (string), testimonial_text (text), rating (integer), published (boolean), created_at (timestamp).

function: Display client feedback and services offered to build credibility.
static_description: Grid layout featuring client quotes with star ratings. Each card includes client name/photo and short testimonial excerpt in navy text.

interaction_and_states.description: Infinite scroll loads more testimonials dynamically fetched from /api/testimonials.

resource_dependency.driverProfilesSchema: Database view joining users and profiles tables filtered by role='driver'. Fields: user_id, full_name, bio, avatar_url, years_experience (calculated field).

function: Showcase driver profiles relevant to potential employers or clients.
static_description: Card-based grid layout with driver avatars, names, bios, and experience levels. Cards have navy borders and text on white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a driver card navigates to a detailed profile view at /drivers/{userId}.
Typing in search bar filters displayed drivers based on name or bio keywords.

resource_dependency.jobListingSchema: Database query selecting active job postings joined with client info. Includes title, description, location, posted date, and client name.

function: Display available job opportunities to prospective applicants.
static_description: List view with job cards containing title, brief description, location, and posting date. Filter options above the list allow sorting by location or date.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a job card expands details or redirects to the full job posting page.
Selecting filter criteria updates the displayed list via API call with query parameters.

resource_dependency.contactDetails: Predefined office locations, phone numbers, and email addresses stored as configuration constants.
resource_dependency.mapAPIIntegration: Interactive map API (e.g., Google Maps) to display office locations.

function: Provide multiple ways for visitors to get in touch with the organization.
static_description: Two-column layout: left side shows contact form; right side lists office addresses, phones, emails, and embedded interactive map with markers.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking map markers reveals associated office details in an overlay.

resource_dependency.dataFetchingLibrary: Axios or Fetch API used throughout frontend components to retrieve data from backend endpoints.

function: Ensure all dynamic content is loaded asynchronously from backend services rather than hardcoded.
static_description: Loading spinners shown during API requests. Error placeholders appear if data fails to load. Content rendered once received successfully.

interaction_and_states.description: On component mount, useEffect hook triggers API calls to populate dynamic content.

resource_dependency.postgresConnectionConfig: Environment variables DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp used to establish connection pool.

function: Connect backend services securely to PostgreSQL database using predefined credentials.
static_description: Backend initialization script establishes database connection using environment variables. Connection logs show successful authentication and readiness.

resource_dependency.installScriptCommand: Custom npm command defined in root package.json to execute 'npm install' in both frontend and backend directories concurrently.

function: Streamline dependency installation for entire project with a single command.
static_description: Root-level package.json includes custom script that runs parallel installations in FE and BE folders without manual intervention.

interaction_and_states.description: Running 'npm run install:all' executes sequential or concurrent installs depending on platform support.

resource_dependency.devServerCommand: Concurrently running dev servers for frontend (e.g., Vite) and backend (e.g., Node.js/Express) orchestrated via package.json scripts.

function: Enable simultaneous development of frontend and backend with hot-reloading capabilities.
static_description: Root package.json defines 'dev' script that launches both frontend and backend development environments together.

interaction_and_states.description: Executing 'npm run dev' starts both servers and outputs logs from each in terminal/console.
